title: New: Lostboycrow – C'est La Vie
body:
There are few around at the moment who can nail an upbeat melody in the same manner that LA’s **Lostboycrow** can.

In truth, his latest track, _C’est La Vie_, could quite easily be a cut from the forthcoming Years & Years album; it’s got the same summer feel-good factor. Check it out below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a selection of the current hottest tracks.
